description:
Arisa and Nanoha are invited to tea at the Tsukimura home. All goes well until a cat finds a Jewel Seed in the garden and activates it. Nanoha and Yuuno set out to seal it, but they encounter another mage dressed in black. What is her purpose there?
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Rival!? Mou Hitori no Mahou Shoujo na no!
ライバル!? もうひとりの魔法少女なの!
